alert.note: Alert for East Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet; West Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued November 10 at 5:05PM MST until November 11 at 12:00AM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Visibility less than a quarter mile in dense fog. * WHERE...West Slopes and East Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet. * WHEN...Until midnight MST tonight. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The product may be extended into Saturday morning if the dense fog persists.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet; West Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet
